short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This saves you from the Scam insurance products added to your cart automatically when you shop online.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Kill'em App is designed to give you back control over your shopping experiences. In recent years, stores have begun adding fees like Shipping Insurance, Shipping Protection, and "Green Shipping Protection" which are automatically added to your cart. 

Our extension will instantly block these apps from auto adding these insurance products to your cart while you shop on any store. Currently we block Route Shipping Protection, Guide, Corso, and a handful of similar apps. 

As we identify more of these apps we will block them as well.
